title: 880: How to Squat Like a Pro
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin discuss what it takes to master the squat.

  • Tribalism and fostering an open minded community. (2:24)
  • How to Squat Like a Pro (17:30)
    • Why Squatting is Important and what is considered strong for a squat? (18:50)
    • When & How to Add Resistance. (24:20)
    • Our Best Squatting Tips:  The most important keys to getting a good, deep squat, that's actually quite commonly overlooked. (31:34)
    • Takeaways and actionable steps. (47:00)

People Mentioned:

  • Warren Farrell, PhD (@drwarrenfarrell)  Twitter
  • Dr. Jordan Shallow D.C (@the_muscle_doc)  Instagram
  • Ben Pakulski ® | Official (@bpakfitness)  Instagram

Links/Products Mentioned:

  • MAPS Fitness Products
  • October Promotion: MAPS Aesthetic ½ off!!
    • **Code “BLACK50” at checkout**
  • Mind Pump FREE Resources
  • Chart: Are You Strong?
  • Free Report: How to Squat like a Pro
  • Mind Pump Episode 872: Dr. Warren Farrell- The Boy Crisis
  • Accessories: Rubberbanditz Resistance Band Set
  • Dunphy Squat- Improve Your Squat with this Secret Exercise - YouTube
  • Tension Squat- Increase Squat Depth with this Simple Exercise - YouTube
